004package kut;
005
006import java.util.function.Function;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008
009/** Tupla de dos elementos */
010public class Tp<T, U> {
011  /** Elemento 1 */
012  public final T e1;
013  /** Elemento 2 */
014  public final U e2;
015
016  /**
017   * Constructor.
018   * @param e1 Elemento 1.
019   * @param e2 Elemento 2.
020   */
021  public Tp (T e1, U e2) {
022    this.e1 = e1;
023    this.e2 = e2;
024  }
025
026  @Override
027  public String toString () {
028    return "Tp(" + e1.toString() + ", " + e2.toString() + ")";
029  }
030
031  /**
032   * Returns Tp 'JSONized' in 'js'.
033   * @param <T> Type of Tp element 1.
034   * @param <U> Type of Tp element 2.
035   * @param js Tp 'JSONized'.
036   * @param eFromJs1 Function to restore the element 1 of the Tp 'JSONized' in 'js'.
037   * @param eFromJs2 Function to restore the element 2 of the Tp 'JSONized' in 'js'.
038   * @return Tp 'JSONized" in 'js'.
039   */
040  public static <T, U> Tp<T, U> fromJs (
041    String js, Function<String, T> eFromJs1, Function<String, U> eFromJs2
042  ) {
043    ArrayList<String> a = Js.ra(js);
044    if (a.size() != 2) {
045      js = js.length() <= 50 ? js : js.substring(47) + "...";
046      throw new IllegalArgumentException(
047      "  \n'" + js + "' is not a valid Tp JSONization." +
048      "  \n Tp JSONization type is \"[JS-element1,JS-element2]\""
049      );
050    }
051    return new Tp<>(eFromJs1.apply(a.get(0)), eFromJs2.apply(a.get(1)));
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Returns JSON representation of 'tp' ("[JS-element1, JS-element2]").
056   * @param <T> Type of 'tp' element1.
057   * @param <U> Type of 'tp' elemen2.
058   * @param tp Tp.
059   * @param eToJs1 Function to 'JSONize' the element 1 of 'tp'.
060   * @param eToJs2 Function to 'JSONize' the element 2 of 'tp'.
061   * @return JSON representation of 'tp'.
062   */
063  public static <T, U> String toJs (
064    Tp<T, U> tp, Function<T, String> eToJs1, Function<U, String> eToJs2
065  ) {
066    return Js.w(Arr.mk(eToJs1.apply(tp.e1), eToJs2.apply(tp.e2)));
067  }
068
069}
